title: Low-Income Country Women and Children’s Health Education Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of introductory public health concepts and global health issues, with simulation tool experience
context.additional_context: Case-based training for practicing professionals applicable to real-world settings. Utilizes personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to formulate three core strategies for addressing women’s and children’s health issues in low-income countries.
Achieve over 80% decision-making accuracy in maternal and child health scenarios using VR simulations.
Develop at least one region-specific health education module through group collaboration.

resources: Health Data Package for Low-Income Countries

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
